scripts.db:build: bunx drizzle-kit generate:sqlite --schema ./src/db/schema.ts && bun run src/util/migrate.ts
scripts.git:readme: git add README.md && git commit -m 'Update README.md' && git push
scripts.git:general: git add . && git commit -m 'General updates including improvements and bugfixes' && git push
scripts.git:refactor: git add . && git commit -m 'Refactor code' && git push
scripts.git:commit: git add . && git commit -m "$npm_config_message" && git push -u origin master
